Job Description: Junior Business Development Manager, , Would you like a starter job within a fast scaling international Payments company where you can learn from some of the most experienced professionals in the market, , As a Junior Business Development Manager, you will be responsible for prospecting new merchants and working closely with the International Sales team to secure new business Must have a strong desire to learn how Afterpay adds value to our customers and be able to articulate the value proposition to prospecting clients This is the perfect opportunity for eager professionals to join an exciting, fast paced, International Sales Team and kick start your career in payments, The role is based in Amsterdam and requires candidates to be fluent in Dutch and English, both spoken and written, , , , , , After haar oprichting in 2010 is de organisatie uitgegroeid tot de AfterPay organisatie die ze nu is Van FinTech startup tot marktleider in het achteraf betalen De betaalmethode is bij duizenden webwinkels te gebruiken en onderdeel van het dagelijkse betalingsverkeer in ieder huishouden Samen met meer dan honderd ambitieuze collegas wordt er iedere dag hard gewerkt om koploper te blijven in de dynamische wereld van online betalen Gericht op ontwikkeling en innovatie, om zo gezamenlijk de kwaliteit van de AfterPay dienstverlening continu te blijven verbeteren Werken bij AfterPay betekent werken bij een van de meest toonaangevende werkgevers van de Benelux Het betekent werken bij een organisatie waar je je stem kunt laten horen, waar je de kans krijgt om je te ontwikkelen en waar van nature een steentje wordt bijgedragen aan de maatschappij, , Beschik jij over unieke kwaliteiten om het talentvolle team van AfterPay te versterken Breng jij de energie, kennis enof ervaring om te voorzien in innovatieve ideen Draag die dosis potentieel aan door te solliciteren op de vacature en wie weet ben jij binnenkort een van de Afterpeople Ga voor meer informatie naar de website wwwafterpaynl, , , Lets be honest, finance is complicated So we at Arvato Financial Solutions are proud to be guiding international as well as renowned local companies through the complex world of cash flows Whether our customers sell shoes in ecommerce or offer telecommunications services, our services ensure efficient credit management for the best possible financial performance Our approximately 7,500 employees solve new challenges in payments and complex data riddles every day, and do so cleverly, analytically and with an eye for every little detail as that is our DNA We are seeking colleagues who want to take an active part in this  whether they are young professional, IT specialists, data analysts, advisers, managers or lateral entrants And thanks to our presence in around 20 countries with a focus on Europe and America, there will usually be the right job available nearby Innovate Yourself, , , At AfterPay we have a clear goal to be the leading partner for payafterdelivery solutions in the European ecommerce market A central part of our strategy is a convenient and safe payment process via the AfterPay portal requiring just a few finger taps Whether by invoice, direct debit or instalment payments  customers decide how and when they want to pay and are provided with many innovative tools AfterPay is clearly focused on the wishes and needs of its users our highest aim is customer satisfaction, with which we want to achieve longterm, successful customer loyalty, , Arvato Finance BV, , Nederland, , ZuidHolland, , Algemene informatie, Are you ready to live the Legend as our new Marketing Assistant, , Would you like to develop yourself in the field of Marketing In this role you play an active role in promoting our luxury hotel, , , , What is this job really about You will be responsible for all external publicity of Sofitel Legend The Grand Amsterdam, Bridges and Garden Bistro Oriole, , Daily activities include writing promotional texts and press releases, analyzing media sources, and designing promotional material You will be the contact person of journalists, influencers and business professionals Creating larger brand awareness will be your aim, , Content creation include storytelling, copy writing, photography, video editing, and the use of Photoshop, InDesign and Illustrator This role is also dedicated to ecommerce and responsible for the social media accounts You determine the right strategy to present us, , You will work together with the ECommerce Specialist, an intern and the Director of Sales  Marketing, , , , , , Hit apply, make sure to upload your CV  motivational letter Take that first step towards a new career opportunity It is possible to apply until the 16th of December, , We are looking forward to getting to know you, , Just ask our Talent  Culture department, telephone number 0205553194 or via email h2783hr2sofitelcom
